dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.log
Class Log

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.log.Log

public class Log
extends java.lang.Object

The Log class provides static methods to log messages to the Error Log and to control logging of usage errors for public API methods. Logging of public API errors is controlled via the Options class.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.a
